text:
Company: Dixon-Burton

Role: Office Administrator

Company Background:
Dixon-Burton is a dynamic and inclusive firm committed to fostering a diverse and equitable workplace. Our team thrives on the diversity of its members, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can succeed.

Job Type: Full-Time

Job Description:
We are seeking a diligent and organized Office Administrator to join our team. The successful candidate will manage office operations, support various departments, and ensure our office runs smoothly. 

Responsibilities:
- Oversee daily office operations and procedures.
- Coordinate schedules, appointments, and meetings.
- Assist with project planning and management.
- Maintain office supplies and equipment.
- Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field.
- Previous experience in office administration or operations management is desirable.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and project management software.
- Strong organizational and communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from USD 40,000 to USD 60,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Supportive and inclusive work environment.

Our Commitment:
Dixon-Burton promotes equal opportunities for all candidates. Our hiring practices aim to reflect the diversity of our community, ensuring that every candidate is evaluated based on merit. We encourage applications from individuals of all backgrounds.
